lines.string: Greetings traveller, welcome to my little mobile shop! Here yo can put that gold of yours to good use, buying both, weapons and spells.
I don't like people to stare at my inventory for too long, so I will only display my products one time. I will leave right after that, so don't buy willy nilly.
So, would you like to see what I have to offer? I have some good new stuff...
Thank you for your purchase! I should get going now, these place really gives me the heebie-jeebies. Good luck in your adventure, until we meet again!
Too bad... well, think about it and come back anytime, I will be waiting for you!
I'm sorry... but I don't think any of the stuff I have with me can help you, it's a bit too advanced for your current equipment. Get a weapon and a spell and then come back.
